title: 美國參議員羅姆尼：中國以暴力對待香港示威者顯示美國要緊急地與盟友製定全面戰略去處理上升的中國威脅

replies.msg:
After 70 years in power, the Chinese Communist Party continues a relentless campaign of brutal repression and censorship. An authoritarian China is perhaps the single greatest threat to freedom around the world.

China’s grave human rights abuses, particularly the use of violence against protesters in Hong Kong and the internment of the Uighur people, underscore the urgency for the U.S. to partner with our friends and allies on a comprehensive strategy to address the rising China threat.

https://twitter.com/SenatorRomney/status/1179105324944547841?s=09
